Html:
Hi,

I wonder why region adapter for panels are not implemented. Instead you just support ItemsControl region adapter.
I know why you did this, because you want us to provide data types as views. And data can be applied to ItemsControl but panels accept only UIElements.

According to MVP views should only be visual elements and not data. And data should be the model and not view AND model!

Benjamin

Search the past discussions a little bit, I brought this up about a month ago.

They gave a reason, it just didn't seem to sit well with me, so I created my own panel region.  Wasn't all that hard to do actually.
